net.sourceforge.gxl
Class GXLValidator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.gxl.GXLValidator
public class GXLValidator
extends Object

Validates GXLDocument and GXLElements for conformance to DTD Requirements and Additional Constraints. More specific DTD constraints Child elements: Only certain types are allowed Some types come with a restriction on how many children are allowed (or must exist) The children has some restrictions on ordering Attributes: Only certain attributes are allowed Some attributes are required Only certain values are allowed ID/IDREF must conform to reference integrity Additonal Constraints: Special attributes restrict allowed elements and attributes Order attributes must be integers and be "orderable" Edge/Rel idrefs must point to Node/Edge/Rels
